segment.target: DISM How-to Topics (Deployment Image Servicing and Management)

segment.source: DISM How-to Topics (Deployment Image Servicing and Management)
segment.target: DISM How-to Topics (Deployment Image Servicing and Management)

segment.source: DISM How-to Topics (Deployment Image Servicing and Management)
segment.target: DISM How-to Topics (Deployment Image Servicing and Management)

segment.source: This section provides information about servicing an existing Windows image using the Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) tool.
segment.target: This section provides information about servicing an existing Windows image using the Deployment Image Servicing and Management (DISM) tool.

segment.source: You can add or remove language packs or drivers, and you can update an existing offline or online image when new software and hardware become available.
segment.target: You can add or remove language packs or drivers, and you can update an existing offline or online image when new software and hardware become available.

segment.source: Offline servicing is updating an image that has been mounted or applied, but is not currently installed and running.
segment.target: Offline servicing is updating an image that has been mounted or applied, but is not currently installed and running.

segment.source: Online servicing is updating the image on a running installation of the Windows operating system.
segment.target: Online servicing is updating the image on a running installation of the Windows operating system.

segment.source: You can use DISM to mount a Windows image (.wim) file or a virtual hard disk (VHD) for servicing.
segment.target: You can use DISM to mount a Windows image (.wim) file or a virtual hard disk (VHD) for servicing.
